parts.text: {"word":"non-transitioning","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"(人について)性別移行をしていない、または性別移行を望んでいない","english_definition":"(of a person) not undergoing or not desiring to undergo gender transition.","examples":[{"sentence":"The study focused on the experiences of non-transitioning transgender individuals.","translation":"その研究は、性別移行をしていないトランスジェンダー個人の経験に焦点を当てた。"},{"sentence":"Some transgender people are non-transitioning for personal or medical reasons.","translation":"個人的または医学的な理由で、性別移行をしないトランスジェンダーの人もいる。"}],"synonyms":["gender non-conforming","non-binary","cisgender"],"antonyms":["transitioning","transgender","gender-affirming"],"usage_notes":"This term is often used in discussions about transgender identity and experiences. It is important to use respectful and inclusive language when discussing these topics. Some individuals may prefer different terminology to describe their identity.","related_words":["transgender","gender identity","gender dysphoria","gender expression","gender affirmation","transitioning"],"level_frequency":{"frequency_google_ngram":"Low frequency"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"The term 'non-transitioning' refers to individuals who identify as transgender but do not pursue medical or surgical interventions to align their physical characteristics with their gender identity. This can be due to various reasons, including personal choice, financial constraints, or health concerns. It's a term used within the transgender community and in academic or clinical settings discussing transgender experiences."}]}
